articles.title: Japan shares head for muted open; investors set to monitor shares of Apple suppliers in Asia - CNBC
articles.description: Apple is reportedly planning a hardware subscription service for iPhones that could launch as soon as the end of this year.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Stocks in Japan rose in early trade Friday as Wall Street stocks rallied overnight and oil prices fell.

articles.title: 25-year-old Thai star of Netflix series The Stranded dies in his sleep - AsiaOne
articles.description: Thai actor Beam Papangkorn Lerkchaleampote died yesterday (March 23) at the age of 25. According to media reports, Beam died in his sleep and his mother was the first to discover his body. Officials are investigating the cause of death. Beam rose to fame afte…
articles.content:
Thai actor Beam Papangkorn Lerkchaleampote died yesterday (March 23) at the age of 25.
According to media reports, Beam died in his sleep and his mother was the first to discover his body.

articles.title: Singapore extends quarantine-free entry as Asia shifts to "living with COVID" - Reuters.com
articles.description: Singapore said on Thursday it will lift quarantine requirements for all vaccinated travellers from next month, joining a string of countries in Asia moving more firmly toward a "living with the virus" approach.
articles.content: SINGAPORE, March 24 (Reuters) - Singapore said on Thursday it will lift quarantine requirements for all vaccinated travellers from next month, joining a string of countries in Asia moving more firmly… [+4240 chars]
